name: Patient 2917
description:
You’ve awoken inside of a madhouse, and you’re the only one sane… At least you think so. Welcome to Wisteria Asylum, home to the criminally insane and you’re new home. Inside these walls lie some of the most dangerous and unstable patients, and the staff aren’t much better. Each day is the same, wake up, eat, choke down meds, wander the grounds, sleep, and repeat. It’s enough to drive even a sane person completely insane! You shouldn’t be here. You know it, but no one believes you. The only option is to break out. Can you surpass the wicked staff? What about the over packed halls of raving lunatics? If you can survive, freedom awaits, if not… Wisteria Asylum has far worse in store. Good luck.  

--  

Project 2917 is an escape game where the player attempts to free themselves from the confines of Wisteria Asylum, a cesspool for the criminally insane. In this thriller/horror game, player will face several challenges and make difficult choices in order to gain their freedom. Along the way they will encounter staff and more importantly, other patients, that can either help or impede their attempts at escape.
